descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/iXYATMB.png[/img]


[size=3][b]A standing stone area overhaul...
[/b][/size][size=1]
[color=#efefef](4/13 Completed)[/color][/size][b]
[/b]

[color=#ffd966][size=1]13/7/2017 - I have added an [b]optional[/b] download of
what i have worked on for the [b]Shadow Stone[/b].
I have been constrained for time due to my
Diploma so i haven't been able to work on this
much at all the past months. Sorry about that![/size][/color]



x
I N T R O D U C T I O N

[color=#efefef]The standing stones are important stones of power...
So why in Talos's name are they just left unnoticed in some
far reaches of the wilderness or on some slab of stone on what
can be considered the main road between Whiterun, Falkreath and Helgen?

Where are the ruins? the pilgrims? the proof that they
have been used and visited over the ages?

This is a mod that aims to overhaul the areas around
each of the 13 standing stones by making them feel
more visited and used. I'll add ruins, clutter, trees,
plants, and more!
[/color]

[i][color=#ffd966][size=1]NOTE: The bridges in the screenshots are part of the Convenient Bridges Mod![/size][/color][/i]
[size=1][i]NOTE: This is my first mod for Skyrim, this is also my own taste and may
not suit others which is fine!
[/i][/size]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/4q3kmln.png[/img]



x
F E A T U R E S

[b][i][u]Guardian Stones...[/u][/i][/b]
- Slightly adjusted placement of Standing Stones
- Ruins (and ruin based clutter)
- Added Trees
- Added a sleeping roll
- Added safe chest
- Some food barrels
- A satchel
- A skill book for each stone
- A weapon/spell for each stone


[b][i][u]More to come...

[/u][/i][/b][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/jfziGZ7.png[/img][/center][center]
